FuncDef: The display ip rd-filter command displays detailed information about the configured route distinguisher (RD) filter.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an RD filter.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1024.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view detailed information about the configured RD filter, run the display ip rd-filter command.
If rd-filter-number is not specified, the display ip rd-filter command displays detailed information about all configured RD filters.
